sentences.en: Emmett, that skirt is a hoot ( Bobbie Ann Mason )
sentences.cn: 爱米特, 那条裙子真是滑稽 ( 鲍比安梅森 )

sentences.en: He couldn't play saxophone but hoot, which set us laughing.
sentences.cn: 他根本不会吹萨克斯管,只吹出“嘟嘟”的声音, 把我们大家逗得哈哈大笑.

sentences.en: He doesn't give a hoot whom he bawls out.
sentences.cn: 不管骂谁他都满不在乎.

sentences.en: His proposal isn't worth a hoot.
I can be very rude to motorists who hoot at me.
sentences.cn: 对那些朝我按喇叭的司机我会很不客气。

sentences.en: I don't give a hoot what you think.
sentences.cn: 我根本不在乎你怎么想

sentences.en: I never hoot my horn when I pick a girl up for a date.
sentences.cn: 我开车接女孩出去约会时从不按喇叭。

sentences.en: Let's hoot him down if he doesn't answer our questions directly.
sentences.cn: 如果他不正面回答咱们的问题,我们就把他轰下去.

sentences.en: Michael Fish is my favourite. He's a hoot, a real character.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢迈克尔·菲什。他滑稽逗趣，是个实实在在的人物。

sentences.en: Mortlake strode on, ignoring the car, in spite of a further warning hoot.
sentences.cn: 莫特莱克继续大步前行，不理会那辆汽车，尽管它又鸣喇叭警告。

sentences.en: Mother will hoot when she hears.
The protesters chanted, blew whistles and hooted at the name of Governor Pete Wilson.
sentences.cn: 这些抗议者们听到州长皮特·威尔逊的名字时又喊口号，又吹口哨，还大声尖叫。

sentences.en: The sudden hoot of a whistle broke into my thoughts.
sentences.cn: 突然响起的汽笛声打断了我的思路.

sentences.en: The whole performance was a hoot.
They just don't give a hoot.
We heard the distant hoot of an owl in the woods.
sentences.cn: 我们听到远处树林里猫头鹰的鬼叫声.

phrases.phrase: give a hoot 或 care a hoot
not care (或 give) a hoot (或 two hoots)

trans.tran_cn: 猫头鹰叫声，汽笛响声，汽车喇叭声，嘲骂声
trans.tran_en: a shout or laugh that shows you think something is funny or stupid
if an  owl  hoots, it makes a long ‘oo’ sound

trans.tran_cn: 轰赶，呵斥，作猫头鹰叫声，汽笛等嘟嘟
